column3: Latest;Kampong Cham:------ At 7:00 pm on January 22
column5: there is a fire on the forest at the edge of a curve in the village of Angkunloung
column8: Kampong Cham Province.------After receiving notice of a fire
column9: Kampong Siem district police intervened to prevent the fire from spreading to the people’s homes.------Authorities completely extinguished the blaze by 8:30 pm on the same day. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/407562
